= ROP Fetch =

"""Creates work items that cook a ROP node or network."""

This node cooks a ROP node or network using TOPs.

@top_attributes

::`hip`:
    #type: string

    The path to the `.hip` file that contains the ROP node.

::`outputparm`:
    #type: string

    The name of the parameter on the target ROP node that contains the output file path.

::`rop`:
    #type: string

    The ROP node path within the `.hip` file.

::`range`:
    #type: float3

    The start, end, and increment frame range values.

::`slice`:
    #type: integer

    When running a distributed sim, the slice number associated with the work item.

@parameters

== ROP Fetch ==

:include processor_common#pdg_workitemgeneration:

~~~

ROP Cook Order:
    #id: roporder

    Determines how the ROP nodes should be cooked.

    Frame by Frame:
        The entire ROP chain is cooked for the current frame.
    Node by Node:
        Each ROP is cooked for all frames before moving to the next.

ROP Path:
    #id: roppath

    The path to the ROP node to cook.

@related

- [Node:top/ropoutput]
- [Node:top/ropmantra]
